Title: Relates to the number of signatures for independent nominating petitions
Summary: Relates to the number of signatures for independent nominating petitions; decreases the number of signatures and votes to 15,000 signatures for statewide candidates and 50,000 votes to maintain party ballot status; changes the petition period to 12 weeks and the petitioning time to May-August.
ActClause: AN ACT to amend the election law, in relation to the number of signatures for independent nominating petitions
